name: Zyxel Voice File
summary: Learn about .ZVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Zyxel Communications is a Taiwanese telecommunications company that was founded in 1989. The company has produced a variety of telecommunications devices and software, including Zfax.
NOTE: In the past, Zyxel spelled its name as ZyXEL.

instructions: Zyxel ZFax and Zyxel Voice Connect can play ZVD files. While ZFax is still available online, it is an MS-DOS application. Thus, you will likely have to run ZFax in an MS-DOS emulator, such as DOSBox.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
